title: Tour in Viet Nam
highlights: Viet Nam so beautiful!
Viet Nam so good!

describe.name: Ngoc Son
describe.title: Ngoc Son Temple (Jade Mountain Temple) was erected in the 19th century in commemoration of Tran Hung Dao, the greatest military commander of the Tran Dynasty
highlights: Upon arrival in the charming city of Hanoi, you will be greeted warmly by our tour guide before proceeding to your reserved hotel.
Hotels in Hanoi begin offering check-in services at 2 p.m., so you can arrive by then or pay an extra price for early check-in.
You will have the rest of the day to unwind after such a lengthy flight to Hanoi.
You can either sleep at that time to refresh your head or wander around the neighborhood around your hotel to take in the ambiance of Hanoi (highly recommended in Hanoi Autumn).

describe.name: Patuxai
